item.description: This area is very close to Montague Center. Parking is very limited so it's easiest to park on the common in Montague Center and walk to the entrance at the end of North Street. This is a very pretty area with trails through fields and woods, located just minutes from the Montague Center common. The Sawmill River intersects the area which is in warm weather is lush with wildflowers, trees, and butterflies.  Come enjoy a stroll, romp and run! Dogs should be on leash to begin with. This is a dog friendly area, please be prepared to pick up, there are is a trash can and usually there are bags available on site. There used to be a tree/log crossing for the stream, but it may have have washed away again.  There are plans to build a bridge over the stream, but I'm not sure when.  If the water level is down, you can actually wade across pretty easily. Come play with us! Call Kristi Cell if questions - 413-695-9848 You can see pictures: http://www.new.facebook.com/album.php?aid=2003081&l=6643b&id=1419625521
item.how_to_find_us: Vanilla PT Cruiser, and see my picture on this site
